version_description: Bug Fixes

* New modes of Login
* Availability and status in prominent positions.
* More legible text everywhere.
* Dynamic font size, in according to your phone size.
* Support for push notifications.
* Fixed those little kinks.
Bug fixes and Performance improvements
We are continuously trying to improve our app. In this version, you can search and choose pickup location for your rides. We've also done some user interface enhancements and bug fixes.

We are trying our best to give you a delightful ride experience. Here are a couple of new features you’ll find in this update-

- We heard you! Now you can save your favorite locations and ride seamlessly with Rapido.

- To help you select your destination faster, we’ve added personalized address suggestions.

- Now you can set your destination location precisely. We’ve introduced choose destination from the map feature.

- Safety of the customers being our priority, we ensure that every user is protected. Each and every ride is insured for no extra cost.
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and Improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
UI improvements and bug fixes.
UI improvements and bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes

We are continuously trying to improve our app. Safety of the customers being our priority, we ensure that every user is protected. Each and every ride on rapido is insured and you can now claim insurance paperless.

We've also done some user interface enhancements and bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes
We heard you! Now you can save more on rides. Here comes Power Pass and Wallet recommendation feature. Enjoy the new update.
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes

We are always working to improve your experience on Rapido through new features and improvements. Here are a couple of new features you'll find in this update:

• Introducing Rapido Free Hit Contest for ICC World Cup 2019! This is the time to support your favourite player while they fulfil their dreams and ride to victory. The goal is to win but the entire experience is incredible which starts with participating in the Rapido Free Hit Contest which gives you a chance to be rewarded with amazing prizes. All you have to do is cheer for your favourite players kyuki #locationpehumlejayenge
#takeyourridetovictory #bleedblue #cricketkacrown

• We care for your safety! You can now add your trusted friends and family as your emergency contacts who could be reached in case of any unexpected situation.

• You can also share your live location with your friends and family so that they can track your ride in real time.
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
Contact your Rapido Captain hassle free using the new Chat feature. Enjoy the new update!

"Hey Siri book a Rapido!"

"Hey Siri where is my Captain?"

• We're super excited for iOS 13 as much as you are! Improvements for compatibility with iOS 13.

• FAQs and Help - Know about Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) and raise your concerns with the Customer Support team using the revamped ticketing.

• My Rides - Check your history of rides and you can now email invoices to your registered email ID.

We're always working to improve your experience with Rapido. In this update, we have revamped the on-ride screen, so that you can check various ride related details, and edit your pickup or drop location on the go.

We're always working to improve your experience with Rapido. In this update, we have revamped the on-ride screen, so that you can check various ride related details, and edit your pickup or drop location on the go.
We're always working to improve your experience with Rapido. In this update, we have added support for dark appearance, new payment method simpl is added and minor bug fixes.

The all new Rapido app is here! We've done a major overhaul to make the app more intuitive and enhance your experience. Enjoy the new update!

The all new Rapido app is here! We've done a major overhaul to make the app more intuitive and enhance your experience. We have squashed some bugs in this version. Enjoy the new update!
The all new Rapido 2.0 is here! Introducing Rapido Local to Send and receive parcels. Enjoy the new update!
We're super excited for iOS 14 as much as you are! We've done improvements for compatibility with iOS 14 and squashed some bugs. Enjoy the update!
Improvements and bug fixes.
We’re continuously working to improve your experience. Now pay for your rides using Google Pay. Enjoy the new update!
Minor bug fixes and enhancements.
In this update we’ve added redefined support experience and bug fixes.
We have added automated bot for resolution of cancellation fee issues. Enjoy the new update!
Bug fixes and improvements.

Now Siri can also book a ride for you.
"Hey Siri book a Rapido !"

Here are a couple of new features you'll find in the latest update:-
* QR Pay - Now pay by scanning QR code from the captain's app at the end of the ride & enjoy cashless rides
* Partial Payments - In case you have low wallet balance & no time to Add Money, you can partially pay in cash for the ride
Happy riding with us!!
Bug fixes and improvements.

Here is a new feature you'll find in the latest update:-
Default Payment- Hurray! Now you can select a particular payment mode and mark it as default. Next time when you book your ride, pay from your selected method.
We have polished a few rough edges in this release.
Bug fixes and improvements
We have tinkered with the application's internals. Now it is better than it was.
